content:
Sure! Here is a table showing the age-based demographics for India by rural and urban areas, based on the latest available data from the National Statistical Office of India (2011 Census of India):

| Age Group | Total Population | Rural Population | Urban Population |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 0-14 | 28.5% | 29.6% | 25.7% |
| 15-59 | 63.5% | 62.5% | 67.6% |
| 60+ | 8.0% | 7.9% | 6.7% |

Note that this data is based on the 2011 census, and there may be slight changes in the demographics since then.

I hope this information is helpful. Let me know if you have any other questions!
